Name: Add-BCDataCacheExtension
Synopsis: Increases the amount of cache storage space that is available on a hosted cache server by adding a new cache file.

Name: Clear-BCCache
Synopsis: Deletes all data in all data cache files and all hash cache files.

Name: Disable-BC
Synopsis: Disables the BranchCache service.

Name: Disable-BCDowngrading
Synopsis: Disables downgrading, so that client computers do not request previous versions of content information from content servers.

Name: Disable-BCServeOnBattery
Synopsis: Configures a client to ignore content discovery requests in distributed cache mode when operating on battery power.

Name: Enable-BCDistributed
Synopsis: Enables BranchCache and configures a computer to operate in distributed cache mode.

Name: Enable-BCDowngrading
Synopsis: Instructs a client computer that is running an operating system in a downgraded mode.

Name: Enable-BCHostedClient
Synopsis: Configures BranchCache to operate in hosted cache client mode.

Name: Enable-BCHostedServer
Synopsis: Configures BranchCache to operate in hosted cache server mode.

Name: Enable-BCLocal
Synopsis: Enables the BranchCache service in local caching mode.

Name: Enable-BCServeOnBattery
Synopsis: Configures a client to listen for content discovery requests in distributed cache mode when operating on battery power.

Name: Export-BCCachePackage
Synopsis: Exports a cache package.

Name: Export-BCSecretKey
Synopsis: Exports a secret key to a file.

Name: Get-BCClientConfiguration
Synopsis: Retrieves the current BranchCache client computer settings.

Name: Get-BCContentServerConfiguration
Synopsis: Retrieves the current BranchCache content server settings.

Name: Get-BCDataCache
Synopsis: Retrieves an object that represents the BranchCache data cache.

Name: Get-BCDataCacheExtension
Synopsis: Retrieves objects that represent the BranchCache data cache extensions from a hosted cache server.

Name: Get-BCHashCache
Synopsis: Retrieves the BranchCache hash cache.

Name: Get-BCHostedCacheServerConfiguration
Synopsis: Retrieves the current BranchCache hosted cache server settings.

Name: Get-BCNetworkConfiguration
Synopsis: Retrieves the current BranchCache network settings.

Name: Get-BCStatus
Synopsis: Retrieves a set of objects that provide BranchCache status and configuration information.

Name: Import-BCCachePackage
Synopsis: Imports a cache package.

Name: Import-BCSecretKey
Synopsis: Imports the cryptographic key that BranchCache uses for the generation of segment secrets.

Name: Publish-BCFileContent
Synopsis: Generates hashes for files in shared folders.

Name: Publish-BCWebContent
Synopsis: Creates hashes for web content.

Name: Remove-BCDataCacheExtension
Synopsis: Deletes a data cache file.

Name: Reset-BC
Synopsis: Resets BranchCache to the default configuration.

Name: Set-BCAuthentication
Synopsis: Specifies the BranchCache computer authentication mode.

Name: Set-BCCache
Synopsis: Modifies the cache file configuration.

Name: Set-BCDataCacheEntryMaxAge
Synopsis: Modifies the maximum amount of time that data can remain in the cache.

Name: Set-BCMinSMBLatency
Synopsis: Sets the minimum latency that must exist between client and server before transparent caching functions are utilized.

Name: Set-BCSecretKey
Synopsis: Sets the cryptographic key used in the generation of segment secrets.
